TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division C Regional 7
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.150.cipherString: Real education must ultimately be limited to one who insists on knowing, the rest is mere sheep-herding.
CIPHER.150.question: The following quote by Ezra Pound has been encode as an Aristocrat for you to solve.  What did they say?

CIPHER.171.cipherString: The engineer's first problem in any design situation is to discover what the problem really is.
CIPHER.171.question: The following quote has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode the cipher?

CIPHER.159.cipherString: Well-timed silence hath more eloquence than speech.
CIPHER.159.question: The following strange sentences are a Baconian cipher of a quote by Martin Fraquhar Tupper that starts with WELL.  What did they say?

CIPHER.157.cipherString: You will never get to a new place by walking an old path.
CIPHER.157.question: A quote by Toni Sorenson has been encoded as a Baconian Cipher.  What did they say?

CIPHER.151.cipherString: Did you hear about the math teacher who's afraid of negative numbers? He will stop at nothing to avoid them.
CIPHER.151.question: The following Aristocrat should be easy for you to decode.

CIPHER.166.cipherString: What did the stamp say to the envelope on Valentine's Day? "I'm stuck on you!"
CIPHER.166.question: Decode the following quote which has been encoded as a Porta cipher using a key of BIND.

CIPHER.174.cipherString: Living is my job and my art.
CIPHER.174.question: Decode the following quote by Michel Eyquem de Montaigne which has been encoded as a Hill cipher using a keyword of FRET.

CIPHER.156.cipherString: You can do only one thing at a time. I simply tackle one problem and concentrate all efforts on what I am doing at the moment.
CIPHER.156.question: The following quote by Maxwell Maltz has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 keyword.  What did they say?

CIPHER.167.question: Solve the following Cryptarithm in order to decode what 6977412 892710512 maps to.

CIPHER.152.cipherString: Everything we care about lies somewhere in the middle, where pattern and randomness interlace.
CIPHER.152.question: The following quote by James Gleick has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 keyword.  What did they say?

CIPHER.164.cipherString: There may be no excuse for laziness, but I'm still looking.
CIPHER.164.question: An observation has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with THER.

CIPHER.168.question: Solve the following cryptarithm in order to decode what 83675 162247 maps to.

CIPHER.160.cipherString: El artista pensó que le habían robado su pintura favorita, pero era solo un pigmento de su imaginación.
CIPHER.160.question: A humorous statement has been translated into Spanish and then encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 English keyword.  What was the Spanish statement?
CIPHER.160.translation: The artist thought his favorite paint had been stolen, but it was just a pigment of his imagination.

CIPHER.161.cipherString: life is a continous journey of transformation
CIPHER.161.question: A quote by Sukant Ratnakar has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 0=●, 9=–, 8=×, 7=●, 2=×

CIPHER.170.cipherString: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
CIPHER.170.question: A quote by Ben Stein has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the key phrase used to encode the quote?

CIPHER.158.cipherString: You just wasted a question by asking, "May I ask you a question?
CIPHER.158.question: The following symbols are a Baconian cipher encoding a quote by Atef Ashab Uddin Sahil.  What did they say?

CIPHER.163.cipherString: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change.
CIPHER.163.question: A quote by A.P.J. Abdul Kalam has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=–●, 2=●×, 3=–×, 4=×–, 5=××

CIPHER.172.cipherString: The reality exists within and we are searching it in gamut of illusion.
CIPHER.172.question: A quote by Rajesh Walecha has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5 rails were used to encode it.  What did they say?

CIPHER.165.cipherString: Victory is in the quality of the competition, not just the final score.
CIPHER.165.question: The following quote by Mike Marshall needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of GAME

CIPHER.153.cipherString: Strong as our passions are, they may be starved into submission, and conquered without being killed.
CIPHER.153.question: Charles Caleb Colton offers us some advice that has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.155.cipherString: Early scientists were often ridiculed for their theories. Be open to replacing outdated belief systems with new ones.
CIPHER.155.question: The following Patristocrat uses a K1 alphabet to encode a quote by Jennifer Ritchie Payette.  What did they say?

CIPHER.162.cipherString: The easiest way to do anything is properly.
CIPHER.162.question: A quote by K. J. Parker has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=–×, 2=●●, 3=×–, 4=●×, 5=––

CIPHER.173.question: Encode the following quote from Anthony Powell as a Hill cipher using a keyword of LEND.

CIPHER.154.cipherString: If ewe see an aunty madder version of yoursefl runnign twoards ewe, think twice befoer embarcing.
CIPHER.154.question: Your friend who can't spell or type very well is trying to offer you some advice which has then been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they actually type in?

CIPHER.169.cipherString: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
CIPHER.169.question: The following quote by Napoleon Hill is an Aristocrat encoded using a K3 key phrase.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode the cipher?
